titleStmt.title: On the death of the most sadly, ever to be deplored, most illustrious, Right Honourable, James Lord Marquess of Montrose, &c. Funeral elegie.
titleStmt.author: Murray, Mungo, 17th cent.

notesStmt.note: Text signed at end: M. M.
Text printed in two columns, within thick black frames.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
